sentence.Network_en: The town was famous in antiquity for its white bulls.
sentence.Network_cn: 该镇在古时以其白色公牛闻名。

sentence.Network_en: It indicates the antiquity of the tradition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这表明该传统源远流长。

sentence.Network_en: The statue was brought to Rome in antiquity .
sentence.Network_cn: 这座雕像是古时运到罗马的。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French antiquite, from Latin antiquitas, from antiquus 'old, former' (see antique)

entry.tran: 古代，古时（尤指古埃及、古希腊、古罗马时期）
entry.def: Antiquity is the distant past, especially the time of the ancient Egyptians, Greeks, and Romans.

example.tran: 古典时期的著名纪念碑

example.ex: The town was famous in antiquity for its white bulls.
example.tran: 该镇在古时以其白色公牛闻名。

entry.def: Antiquities are things such as buildings, statues, or coins that were made in ancient times and have survived to the present day.

example.tran: 古罗马时期物品的收藏家

entry.def: The antiquity of something is its great age.

example.ex: It indicates the antiquity of the tradition.
example.tran: 这表明该传统源远流长。

means.word_mean: 1. the historic period preceding the Middle Ages in Europe
3. an artifact surviving from the past

auth_sentence.content: I said it was a famous statue in antiquity.
auth_sentence.res_content: I said it was a famous statue in antiquity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I said it was a famous statue in antiquity.

auth_sentence.content: The coolest and most practical thinker of all antiquity...Aristotle.
auth_sentence.res_content: The coolest and most practical thinker of all antiquity...Aristotle.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The coolest and most practical thinker of all antiquity...Aristotle.

auth_sentence.content: To trace legends back to yet more hoar antiquity.
auth_sentence.res_content: To trace legends back to yet more hoar antiquity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To trace legends back to yet more hoar antiquity.

stems_affixes.word_buile: antiquate[v.使古旧, 废弃]+ed……的→adj.陈旧的,过时的
antiq古老+ue→adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董
antiq古老+ue→adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董
antiqui=antique[adj.古式的,过时的　n.有价值的古物,古董]+ty表名词→n.古老;高龄;古物,古迹

means.word_mean: 古老;年代久远;(尤指中世纪前流传下来的);古代

sentences.en: The museum contains the remains of Chinese antiquity.
sentences.cn: 博物馆藏有古代的遗物。

sentences.en: The origins of this ancient structure are lost in antiquity.
sentences.cn: 这座古建筑的由来已经失传了。

sentences.en: Acupuncture has been used as medical means since antiquity in China.
sentences.cn: 针灸在中国自远古以来就被用作医疗手段了。

sentences.en: Cannabis has been used for medicinal purposes since antiquity.
sentences.cn: 大麻自远古以来就被作为药用。
